Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.Staff Acrobat]{Staff Acrobat}

Requirements You are wielding your staff.

Make a Strike with your staff. As long as you don't critically fail, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} and takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its DC against @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Shove]{Shove}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip}, and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Tumble Through]{Tumble Through} attempts until the start of your next turn.

source.value: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
